title: Don't Even Think About It
description: DON'T EVEN THINK ABOUT...LOVE Katie's only just met Michael but she's already fallen for him. If only he wasn't living opposite that cow of an ex-girlfriend, things would be perfect...DON'T EVEN THINK ABOUT...YOUR EX-BOYFRIEND Sally split up with Michael years ago. He broke her heart, but they're great friends now. The only
author: Lauren Henderson
